title: PENYEMPROTAN RUTIN UNTUK MENCEGAH DAN MEMBASMI KUTU PUTIH #pertanian #durian #ediduren

tasks.task: Apply magnesium sulfate, insecticide, and plant-derived products to new truffle growth and scale insects to prevent white frost damage.
subtasks: Mix magnesium sulfate with other agricultural chemicals.
Identify new truffle growth (trubis baru) on crops.
Differentiate white frost damage (kutub putih) from other issues.
Determine when to apply treatments (immediate action needed).

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Apply magnesium sulfate, insecticide, and plant-derived products to new truffle growth and scale insects to prevent white frost damage.
subtasks: Mix magnesium sulfate with other agricultural chemicals.
Identify new truffle growth (trubis baru) on crops.
Determine when to apply treatments (immediately when needed).
